name: Better AI
effect clean: +2 Coins Collected from Enemies\n+2 To Movement\n-1 To Health
effect buggy: +2 Coins Collected from Enemies\n-1 To Health

name: Consumable Items Overhaul
effect clean: When a 'Buff' Active Effect would come into effect, you may place it onto this card. That effect does not go away until this mod is uninstalled.
effect buggy: When a 'Nerf' Active Effect would come into effect, place it onto this card. That effect does not go away until this mod is uninstalled.

effect buggy: +2 Coins at the start of each maintenance phase

name: Multiclass
effect clean: Choose a stat: Increase that by +1 Per Level\nAll other stats are decreased by -1\n(Stats are Health, Movement, and Damage)
effect buggy: Choose a stat: Increase that by +1 Per Level\nAll other stats are decreased by -3\n(Stats are Health, Movement, and Damage)

name: Player Skins
effect clean: +1 To Damage\n+1 To Health\n+1 To Card Cost

name: Randomizer
effect clean: When rolling for damage or movement, roll twice and take the higher value\nWhen rolling for anything else, roll twice and take the lower value
effect buggy: When rolling for damage or movement, roll twice and take the lower value\n+1 To Health

name: Revamped Sidequests
effect clean: When you would draw an Event card, draw an additional one\n+1 To Health

name: Infinite Money
effect clean: Can draw 1 Mod and 1 System Setting card for free each turn

name: Quicksaves
effect clean: Always checkpoint in front of bosses
effect buggy: Always checkpoint in front of bosses\nUpon player defeat, lose half your 'reliable' coins (Rounded Down)

effect buggy: Once per fight, upon player death, ignore it and heal to full instead\n-2 To Health\n-2 To Movement

name: God Mode
